titleStmt.title: A copy of a letter, containing an account of the murder of Capt. Robert Mead, on the 19th of August last by Burrus Gradon, who was tryed for the same at the Kings-Bench-Bar in Dublin, the 15th of November, after, and found guilty of manslaughter only together with a copy of a letter sent the jury, and some reflections on the verdict.
titleStmt.author: Mead, E.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for S.M. in the year,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, faded print, resultin in loss of text.
Bound and filmed with: Wing W3386B, A401B, G524 and T1560B.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
